review_data.title: By far best sandwich shop in town!
review_data.content: Il pentagramma is by far the best sandwich shop in town. They prepare fresh, tasty Italian sandwiches at reasonable prices, just a few minutes away from the main station. Perfect for a lunch break!

review_data.title: Paninis, paninis, paninis
review_data.content: Best paninis I’ve ever had, made with fresh ingredients, and good value considering that you are in Zurich. We ordered the bologna and viagra panini and both were delicious. Highly recommended if looking for a proper Panini

review_data.title: Fantastic, hole in the wall Italian deli...
review_data.content: Simple, great sandwiches that will last you 2 meals they are so big. Great prices for Zurich. Great selection. Also sells some Italian specialities (wine, cheese, pasta, etc.) So glad I randomly stopped one day!!!!

review_data.title: Pretty average Italian style 'paninoteca' (sandwich shop)
review_data.content: If you're after an authentic Italian sandwich, then this might be the place for you. Service is pretty average as is the food and the price isn't as cheap as you might expect. Also quite smoky inside.
